code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ChipsInput(_ref){let{label,values,setValues,type="text"}=_ref;const[inputValue,setInputValue]=useState("");const addChip=()=>{if(inputValue.trim()==="")return;if(type==="number"&&isNaN(parseFloat(inputValue)))return;const newValue=type==="number"?parseFloat(inputValue):inputValue.trim();setValues([...values,newValue]);setInputValue("");};const removeChip=index=>{setValues(values.filter((_,i)=>i!==index));};const handleKeyDown=e=>{if(e.key==="Enter"||e.key===","){e.preventDefault();addChip();}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chips-input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:label}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chips-container",children:[values.map((val,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"chip",children:[val,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:()=>removeChip(i),children:"\xD7"})]},i)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:inputValue,onChange:e=>setInputValue(e.target.value),onKeyDown:handleKeyDown,placeholder:"Add ".concat(label)})]})]});}
